ProjectSummary.Name: Reapairing  earth road pave Natural Gravel Road
ProjectSummary.Objective: Having good road for traveling and transporting agricultural products and contributing to poverty reduction

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project required environment study.Under environmental watchlist.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: The study showed that project does not harm forest wildlife habitat, cultural site, used water source and local health in the area
Evironmental_Safeguard.Submissiondate: 31-Aug-2009 (Date Environmental Analysis Report and Environmental Management Plan sent to Safeguard Working Group (SWG) of NCDDs)

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require land acquisition report.Public
Land_Safeguard.Reason: The project site is on public land

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: These villages are not in the watched list of HP
